experiences.description:
- Coordinate with Senior Management Team and partner with Regional Finance Team to prepare long-term financial planning, annual budgeting, monthly forecasting and high planning for the next 5 years which are reflected business strategy and financial objective.
- Make, follow and evaluate the accuracy of financial planning and measure business performances.
- Prepare monthly financial statement and management reports for Management team, Regions and JV
- Provide day-to-day support to business teams assisting as necessary to provide financial analysis.
- Day to day manage accounting activities and ensure finance performances and transactions are accurately and compliance with company accounting policies before month-end closing.
- Lead the team that will work in partnership to achieve high standard financial process.
- Control, maximize the net working capital (AR, AP, Inventory) and ensure that the company’s cashflow is adequate and having available funds to meet the company’s financial commitments
- Prepare and deliver timely and accurately the financial statement (P&L, BS, Cash Flow) and analysis reports to Joint Venture (as VAS) and Regions (as IFRS).
- Supervise and manage all tax related issues (tax returns, CIT, PIT, WHT) and support FC in setting up taxation forecast.
- Work closely with Finance Team to support and give advices that are related to month-end closing, internal& external audit and tax finalization.
- Conduct risk assessment of all departments and report risk management issues and internal controls deficiencies identified directly to the Finance controller and the company management board and provide recommendations for improving the organization’s operations. 
- Support management in managing contract and procurement process by being custodian for Contract master data in order to liquidate, renew new signing all commercial contracts of the company.
